blocks.text: Select a pathway to load its flowchart. Toggle compare mode to view two side by side.
Tip: Use left and right arrow keys to move between pathways.
For incidental, asymptomatic lung findings on thoracic CT.

items: Start with the dominant imaging pattern (solid, subsolid, cystic, or interstitial).
Apply size and risk thresholds as shown in each flowchart.
Use compare mode to align two patterns when findings overlap.
